A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Absolutely 100% crapola! Critics should be ashamed to rate this movie so high! I'd rate it 0 stars if I could! Terrible story telling of characters\, terrible plot\, all the new characters (Both good and bad) are unlikeable/boring. Snoke was just axed before we even got any details on him or his back story. He was so over powered and to die so easily I mean come on! They killed off all the original cast characters that matter now. Made Luke's character turn a 360 personality wise and made him a weak broken useless shell of the character he originally was. He should have been a legendary badass. Filled the movie with political agenda bs. Made Rey over powered with zero effort/training. No real lightsaber fight scenes to speak of our worth mentioning. Way to much stalling/filler scenes that could have been cut out as they were not needed at all. Like the scenes of the way luke lived on the island by milking a weird creature or spear fishing etc. Why is this important to know/who cares? I could go on and on. But one thing is for sure\, this is the absolute worst star wars movie ever made hands down!! I see why so many hard core fans are pissed off at this movie and I would not blame them if they all stopped watching future chapters. I don't have any real interest to continue watching any further myself. All the characters I had any interest in are now dead\, what's the point now? A 5 year old could have written a better story than this! Poor director choice and agenda is what killed star wars off!
